short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A broswer extension to help organize saved homes from real estate websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you take your saved homes within zillow.com and allows you to migrate most of the information into a Google sheet that you have access to by providing a link to your google sheet.

How to Use:
1. Go to zillow.com 
2. Sign in and go to your "Saved Homes" page
3. Open the extension and input a google sheet URL/link.
4. Click "Submit" 
5. You should be able to see all your "Saved Homes" info in the google sheet you pasted.

If you provide a specific google sheet with an ID, then it will directly override that sheet with the template currently in the backend. 

These are the current columns supported:
[
	["Type", "__typename"],
	["Main Image", "photos"],
	["Address", "address"],
	["Price", "price"],
	["Zestimate Total", "zestimate"],
	["Zestimate Monthly", "zestimateMonthly"],
	["Living Area\n(sq ft)", "livingArea"],
	["Lot Size\n(sq ft)", "lotSize"],
	["Lot Size\n(acres)", "lotSizeAcres"],
	["Bedrooms", "bedrooms"],
	["Bathrooms", "bathrooms"],
	["Is New Construction", "newConstruction"],
	["Details Page URL", "hdpUrl"],
	["Google Maps URL", "googleMapUrl"],
	["HDP Type Dimension", "hdpTypeDimension"],
	["ZPID", "zpid"],
	["MLS ID", "mlsId"],
]

This doesn't automatically add column filters, etc. 

PLEASE BE MINDFUL OF HOW MANY TIMES YOU CLICK SUBMIT IN A SHORT INTERVAL.
If you press submit within short intervals succession, then zillow will time you out and have to complete the hold/press "i'm not a robot" prompt.

I will be adding some stoppages that new/refreshed data will only be pulled from zillow every 5 mins or so and display when the next refresh allowed time will be. 
There will also be an override button if you DESIRABLY need the new data before 5 mins of the previous call.

Future Plans. 
- will be open-sourcing this project soon, once I clean up lots of the code or migrating to using Plasmo (https://www.plasmo.com/) as the build framework tool for this extension project.
- allow customizations on what all columns a user can include/exclude (there are a lot more column options that I haven't included yet)
- plan to make a better UI sooner or later
- add Redfin
